meanings.definition: The quality or state of being graphic.
meanings.sent1: The graphicnesses of the picture made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the graphicnesses of the illustrations in this book.
meanings.sent3: The graphicnesses of the map made me want to go on an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation had a level of graphicnesses that painted a clear picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the graphicnesses of the cityscape beautifully.

meanings.definition: The graphic nature or quality of something.
meanings.sent1: The graphicnesses of the horror movie scared me.
meanings.sent2: The graphicnesses of the video game made it exciting to play.
meanings.sent3: The graphicnesses of the comic book made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: The graphicnesses of the crime scene was unsettling to witness.
meanings.sent5: The graphicnesses of the documentary brought the reality of the situation to light.
